known_issues: Network deployment/build process is failing (deployment failed error).

existing_features.title: Make the republish/re-deploy operation resilient to transient network/build failures by adding a retry flow that can re-attempt the same deployment without any functional application changes.

Improve deployment failure reporting so that the error surfaced to the user includes actionable, human-readable diagnostics in English (what failed, at which step: build vs deploy, and whether retry is safe).
